thread.title: Olympic Gold Medalist Phil Dalhausser and Nick Lucena Dominate The Beach On Their Road To Rio

author: cbs8
title: Olympic Gold Medalist Phil Dalhausser and Nick Lucena Dominate The Beach On Their Road To Rio
text:
PMG Sports clients Phil Dalhausser and Nick Lucena sit atop the FIVB World Tour point standings following their Gold Medal victory at the 2016 FIVB World Tour season opener in Mexico.
Cary, NC (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
U.S. beach volleyball stars Phil Dalhausser and Nick Lucena continued their winning ways in international play this weekend defeating #3 seeded Alexander Brouwer and Robert Meeuwsen of the Netherlands 21-12, 21-18 to win the Puerto Vallarta Open. The duo is red hot on the sand, having placed 2nd or better in each of the last 5 FIVB events they have competed in.
Phil and Nick’s clutch play couldn’t come at a better time. The next 10 months will prove crucial for the duo as they fight to earn points to qualify for the 2016 Summer Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. After competing in just 5 Olympic qualifying events to date, Phil and Nick have already played their way up the rankings right below fellow PMG Sports clients Casey Patterson and Jake Gibb who are currently the #1 team on the beach for the U.S. men’s team.
PMG Sports President and CEO Evan Morgenstein said, “Huge corporations like Under Armour, Red Bull, Oakley and others are lining up to play with the best beach volleyball players in the world. As the hottest trending U.S. athletes vying for the Rio Olympic team, corporate America is starting to pay attention.”
To discuss potential sponsorship opportunities for Phil Dalhausser and Nick Lucena, please contact Evan Morgenstein at evan(at)pmgsports(dot)com or call (919)459-5426. For media inquiries please contact Matt Uberseder at matt(at)pmgsports(dot)com or call (919)459-5428.

Premier Management Group is an elite sports marketing agency with a goal to create a space in the industry that is completely unique through superior creativity and innovation. Additionally, PMG is an industry leader in providing corporate consulting services and treats each client, whether an athlete or corporation, with an added personal touch. For more information, visit our website at http://www.pmgsports.com .
